scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.4.1.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.ba-throttle-debounce.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.uglify-js: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.5.1.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.slim.js _includes/js/target-blank.js _includes/js/cookie-consent.js _includes/js/google_search_instant.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.slim.min.js
scripts.uglify-js-slim-fa: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.5.1.slim.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.slim.js _includes/js/target-blank.js _includes/js/cookie-consent.js _includes/js/google_search_instant.js assets/js/fontawesome/all.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.slim.fa.min.js
scripts.uglify-js-slim-fab: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.5.1.slim.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.slim.js _includes/js/target-blank.js _includes/js/cookie-consent.js _includes/js/google_search_instant.js assets/js/fontawesome/brands.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.slim.fab.min.js
scripts.uglify-js-secondary: uglifyjs assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/scripts/ready.js assets/js/fontawesome/all.js -c -m -o assets/js/secondary.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
